SA07n944:2: evaṃ manodhāraṇayā krameṇa vyapohya kiñcit samupohya kiñcit |
SA07n944:3: dhyānāni catvāryadhigamya yogī prāpnotyabhijñā niyamena pañca ||1 ||
SA07n944:5: atītajanmasmaraṇaṃ ca dīrghaṃ divye viśuddhe śruticakṣuṣī ca ||2 ||
SA07n944:7: tato hi duḥkhaprabhṛtīni samyak catvāri satyāni padānyavaiti ||3 ||
SA07n944:8: bādhātmakaṃ duḥkhamidaṃ prasaktaṃ duḥkhasya hetuḥ prabhavātmako'yam |
SA07n944:10: ityāryasatyānyavabudhya buddhyā catvāri samyak pratividhya caiva |
SA07n944:11: sarvāsravān bhāvanayābhibhūya na jāyate śāntimavāpya bhūyaḥ ||5 ||
SA07n944:13: bhavād bhavaṃ yāti na śantimeti saṃsāradolāmadhiruhya lokaḥ ||6 ||
SA07n944:15: sarvauṣadhīnāmiva bhūrbhavāya sarvāpadāṃ kṣetramidaṃ hi janma ||7 ||
SA07n944:16: yajjanmarūpasya hi sendriyasya duḥkhasya tannaikavidhasya janma |
SA07n944:17: yaḥ saṃbhavaścāsya samucchrayasya mṛtyośca rogasya ca saṃbhavaḥ saḥ ||8 ||
SA07n944:18: sadvāpyasadvā viṣamiśramannaṃ yathā vināśāya na dhāraṇāya |
SA07n944:19: loke tathā tiryaguparyadho vā duḥkhāya sarvaṃ na sukhāya janma ||9 ||
SA07n944:20: jarādayo naikavidhāḥ prajānāṃ satyāṃ pravṛttau prabhavantyanarthāḥ |
SA07n944:22: ākāśayoniḥ pavano yathā hi yathā śamīgarbhaśayo hutāśaḥ |
SA07n944:25: yathā svabhāvo hi tathā svabhāvo duḥkhaṃ śarīrasya ca cetasaśca ||12 ||
SA07n944:26: kāye sati vyādhijarādi duḥkhaṃ kṣuttarṣavarṣoṣṇahimādi caiva |
SA07n944:28: pratyakṣamālokya ca janmaduḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathātītamapīti viddhi |
SA07n944:29: yathā ca tadduḥkhamidaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathānāgatamapyavehi ||14 ||
SA07n944:30: bījasvabhāvo hi yatheha dṛṣṭo bhūto'pi bhavyo'pi tathānumeyaḥ |
SA07n944:31: pratyakṣataśca jvalano yathoṣṇo bhūto'pi bhavyo'pi tathoṣṇa eva ||15 ||
SA07n944:33: tatraiva duḥkhaṃ na hi tadvimuktaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhaviṣyatyabhavad bhaved vā ||16 ||
SA07n944:34: pravṛttiduḥkhasya ca tasya loke tṛṣṇādayo doṣagaṇā nimittam |
SA07n944:35: naiveśvaro na prakṛtirnaṃ kālo nāpo svabhāvo na vidhiryadṛcchā ||17 ||
SA07n944:36: jñātavyametena ca kāraṇena lokasya doṣebhya iti pravṛttiḥ |
SA07n944:38: icchāviśeṣe sati tatra tatra yānāsanāderbhavati prayogaḥ |
SA07n944:43: tathaiva janmasvapi naikarūpo nirvartate kleśakṛto viśeṣaḥ ||21 ||
SA07n944:44: doṣādhike janmani tīvradoṣa utpadyate rāgiṇi tīvrarāgaḥ |
SA07n944:46: phalaṃ hi yādṛk samavaiti sākṣāt tadāgamād bījamavaityatītam |
SA07n944:48: doṣakṣayo jātiṣu yāsu yasya vairāgyatastāsu na jāyate saḥ |
SA07n944:50: tajjanmano naikavidhasya saumya tṛṣṇādayo hetava ityavetya |
SA07n944:51: tāṃśchindhi duḥkhād yadi nirmumukṣā kāryakṣayaḥ kāraṇasaṃkṣayāddhi ||25 ||
SA07n944:52: duḥkhakṣayo hetuparikṣayācca śāntaṃ śivaṃ sākṣikuruṣva dharmaṃ |
SA07n944:54: yasminna jātirna jarā na mṛtyurna vyādhayo nāpriyasaṃprayogaḥ |
SA07n944:55: necchāvipanna priyaviprayogaḥ kṣemaṃ padaṃ naiṣṭhikamacyutaṃ tat ||27 ||
SA07n944:56: dīpo yathā nirvṛtimabhyupeto naivāvaniṃ gacchati nāntarikṣam |
SA07n944:57: diśaṃ na kāṃcid vidiśaṃ na kāṃcit snehakṣayāt kevalameti śāntim ||28 ||
SA07n944:58: evaṃ kṛtī nirvṛtimabhyupeto naivāvaniṃ gacchati nāntarikṣam |
SA07n944:59: diśaṃ na kāṃcid vidiśaṃ na kāṃcit kleśakṣayāt kevalameti śāntim ||29 ||
SA07n944:61: sa bhāvanīyo vidhivad budhena śīle śucau tripramukhe sthitena ||30 ||
SA07n944:63: idaṃ trayaṃ vṛttavidhau pravṛttaṃ śīlāśrayaṃ karmaparigrahāya ||31 ||
SA07n944:65: idaṃ trayaṃ jñānavidhau pravṛttaṃ prajñāśrayaṃ kleśaparikṣayāya ||32 ||
SA07n944:66: nyāyena satyādhigamāya yuktā samyak smṛtiḥ samyagatho samādhiḥ |
SA07n944:67: idaṃ dvayaṃ yogavidhau pravṛttaṃ śamāśrayaṃ cittaparigrahāya ||33 ||
SA07n944:68: kleśāṃkurānna pratanoti śīlaṃ bījāṅkurān kāla ivātivṛttaḥ |
SA07n944:69: śucau hi śīle puruṣasya doṣā manaḥ salajjā iva dharṣayanti ||34 ||
SA07n944:71: sthite samādhau hi na dharṣayanti doṣā bhujaṃgā iva mantrabaddhāḥ ||35 ||
SA07n944:72: prajñā tvaśeṣeṇa nihanti doṣāṃstīradrumān prāvṛṣi nimnageva |
SA07n944:73: dagdhā yayā na prabhavanti doṣā vajrāgninevānusṛtena vṛkṣāḥ ||36 ||
SA07n944:75: duḥkhasya hetūn prajahāti doṣān prāpnoti cātyantaśivaṃ padaṃ tat ||37 ||
SA07n944:76: asyopacāre dhṛtirārjavaṃ ca hrīrapramādaḥ praviviktatā ca |
SA07n944:77: alpecchatā tuṣṭirasaṃgatā ca lokapravṛttāvaratiḥ kṣamā ca ||38 ||
SA07n944:78: yāthātmyato vindati yo hi duḥkhaṃ tasyodbhavaṃ tasya ca yo nirodham |
SA07n944:79: āryeṇa mārgeṇa sa śāntimeti kalyāṇamitraiḥ saha vartamānaḥ ||39 ||
SA07n944:80: yo vyādhito vyādhimavaiti samyag vyādhernidānaṃ ca tadauṣadhaṃ ca |
SA07n944:85: nivṛttimāgaccha ca tannirodhaṃ nivartakaṃ cāpyavagaccha mārgam ||42 ||
SA07n944:87: dagdhaṃ jagat satyanayaṃ hyadṛṣṭvā pradahyate saṃprati dhakṣyate ca ||43 ||
SA07n944:88: yadaiva yaḥ paśyati nāmarūpaṃ kṣayīti taddarśanamasya samyak |
SA07n944:89: samyak ca nirvedamupaiti paśyan nandīkṣayācca kṣayameti rāgaḥ ||44 ||
SA07n944:90: tayośca nandīrajasoḥ kṣayeṇa samyagvimuktaṃ pravadāmi cetaḥ |
SA07n944:91: samyagvimuktirmanasaśca tābhyāṃ na cāsya bhūyaḥ karaṇīyamasti ||45 ||
SA07n944:92: yathāsvabhāvena hi nāmarūpaṃ taddhetumevāstagamaṃ ca tasya |
SA07n944:93: vijānataḥ pasyata eva cāhaṃ bravīmi samyak kṣayamāsravāṇām ||46 ||
SA07n944:94: tasmāt paraṃ saumya vidhāya vīryaṃ śīghraṃ ghaṭasvāstravasaṃkṣayāya |
SA07n944:96: dhātūn hi ṣaḍ bhūsalilānalādīn sāmānyataḥ svena ca lakṣaṇena |
SA07n944:97: avaiti yo nānyamavaiti tebhyaḥ so'tyantikaṃ mokṣamavaiti tebhyaḥ ||48 ||
SA07n944:100: ajātavatsāṃ yadi gāṃ duhīta naivāpnuyāt kṣīramakāladohī |
SA07n944:101: kāle'pi vā syānna payo labheta mohena śṛṅgād yadi gāṃ duhīta ||50 ||
SA07n944:104: taddeśakālau vidhivat parīkṣya yogasya mātrāmapi cābhyupāyam |
SA07n944:105: balābale cātmani saṃpradhārya kāryaḥ prayatno na tu tadviruddhaḥ ||52 ||
SA07n944:106: pragrāhakaṃ yattu nimittamuktamuddhanyamāne hṛdi tanna sevyam |
SA07n944:107: evaṃ hi cittaṃ praśama na yāti pravāyunā vahniriveryamāṇaḥ ||53 ||
SA07n944:108: śamāya yat syānniyataṃ nimittaṃ jātoddhave cetasi tasya kālaḥ |
SA07n944:109: evaṃ hi cittaṃ praśamaṃ niyacchet pradīpyamāno'gnirivodakena ||54 ||
SA07n944:110: śamāvahaṃ yanniyataṃ nimittaṃ sevyaṃ na taccetasi līyamāne |
SA07n944:112: pragrāhakaṃ yanniyataṃ nimittaṃ layaṃ gate cetasi tasya kālaḥ |
SA07n944:114: aupekṣikaṃ nāpi nimittamiṣṭaṃ layaṃ gate cetasi soddhave vā |
SA07n944:116: yatsyādupekṣāniyataṃ nimittaṃ sāmyaṃ gate cetasi tasya kālaḥ |
SA07n944:117: evaṃ hi kṛtyāya bhavetprayogo ratho vidheyāśva iva prayātaḥ ||58 ||
SA07n944:119: rāgātmako muhyati maitrayā hi snehaṃ kaphakṣobha ivopayujya ||59 ||
SA07n944:120: rāgoddhate cetasi dhairyametya niṣevitavyaṃ tvaśubhaṃ nimittam |
SA07n944:122: vyāpādadoṣeṇa manasyudīrṇe na sevitavyaṃ tvaśubhaṃ nimittam |
SA07n944:124: vyāpādadoṣakṣubhite tu citte sevyā svapakṣopanayena maitrī |
SA07n944:125: dveṣātmano hi praśamāya maitrī pittātmanaḥ śīta ivopacāraḥ ||62 ||
SA07n944:126: mohānubaddhe manasaḥ pracāre maitrāśubhā vaiva bhavatyayogaḥ |
SA07n944:127: tābhyāṃ hi saṃmohamupaiti bhūyo vāyvātmako rūkṣamivopanīya ||63 ||
SA07n944:129: mūḍhe manasyeṣa hi śāntimārgo vāyvātmake snigdha ivopacāraḥ ||64 ||
SA07n944:130: ulkāmukhasthaṃ hi yathā suvarṇaṃ suvarṇakāro dhamatīha kāle |
SA07n944:131: kāle pariprokṣayate jalena krameṇa kāle samupekṣate ca ||65 ||
SA07n944:132: dahet suvarṇaṃ hi dhamannakāle jale kṣipan saṃśameyedakāle |
SA07n944:133: na cāpi samyak paripākamenaṃ nayedakāle samupekṣamāṇaḥ ||66 ||
SA07n944:134: saṃpragrahasya praśamasya caiva tathaiva kāle samupekṣaṇasya |
SA07n944:135: samyaṅ nimittaṃ manasā tvavekṣyaṃ nāśo hi yatno'pyanupāyapūrvaḥ ||67 ||
SA07n944:136: ityevamanyāyanivartanaṃ ca nyāyaṃ ca tasmai sugato babhāṣe |
SA07n944:138: yathā bhiṣak pittakaphānilānāṃ ya eva kopaṃ samupaiti doṣaḥ |
SA07n944:139: śamāya tasyaiva vidhiṃ vidhatte vyadhatta doṣeṣu tathaiva buddhaḥ ||69 ||
SA07n944:140: ekena kalpena sacenna hanyāt svabhyastabhāvādasubhān vitarkān |
SA07n944:141: tato dvitīyaṃ kramāmarabheta na tveva heyo guṇavān prayogaḥ ||70 ||
SA07n944:143: samyak prayogasya ca duṣkaratvācchettuṃ na śakyāḥ sahasā hi doṣāḥ ||71 ||
SA07n944:144: aṇvyā yathāṇyā vipulāṇiranyā nirvāhyate tadviduṣā nareṇa |
SA07n944:147: heyaḥ sa taddoṣaparīkṣaṇena saśvāpado mārga ivādhvagena ||73 ||
SA07n944:148: yathā kṣudhārto'pi viśeṣa pṛktaṃ jijīviṣurnecchati bhoktumannam |
SA07n944:150: na doṣataḥ paśyati yo hi doṣaṃ kastaṃ tato vārayituṃ samarthaḥ |
SA07n944:151: guṇaṃ guṇe paśyati yaśca yatra sa vāryamāṇo'pi tataḥ prayāti ||75 ||
SA07n944:158: yathā hi bhīto niśi taskarebhyo dvāraṃ priyebhyo'pi na dātumicchet |
SA07n944:159: prājñastathā saṃharati prayogaṃ samaṃ śubhasyāpyaśubhasya doṣaiḥ ||79 ||
SA07n944:160: evaṃ prakārairapi yadyupāyairnivāryamāṇā na parāṅmukhāḥ syuḥ |
SA07n944:161: tato yathāśthūlanivarhaṇena suvarṇadoṣā iva te praheyāḥ ||80 ||
SA07n944:163: yathā naraḥ saṃśrayate tathaiva prājñena doṣeṣvapi vartitavyam ||81 ||
SA07n944:166: dante'pi dantaṃ praṇidhāya kāmaṃ tālvagramutpīḍya ca jivhayāpi |
SA07n944:167: cittena cittaṃ parigṛhya cāpi kāryaḥ prayatno na tu te'nuvṛttāḥ ||83 ||
SA07n944:168: kimatra citraṃ yadi vītamoho vanaṃ gataḥ svasthamanā na muhyet |
SA07n944:169: ākṣipyamāṇo hṛdi tannimittairna kṣobhyate yaḥ sa kṛtī sa dhīraḥ ||84 ||
SA07n944:173: kāyasya kṛtvā pravivekamātraṃ kleśaprahāṇāya bhajasva mārgam ||86 ||
SA07n944:177: saṃgrāmajid bhadrajidaśvajicca śroṇaśca śoṇaśca ca koṭikarṇaḥ ||88 ||
SA07n944:181: pūrṇaśca pūrṇaśca sa pūrṇakaśca śonāparāntaśca sa pūrṇa eva ||90 ||
SA07n944:184: yaṃ vikramaṃ yogavidhāvakurvaṃstameva śīghraṃ vidhivat kuruṣva |
SA07n944:185: tataḥ padaṃ prāpsyasi tairavāptaṃ sukhāvṛtaistvaṃ niyataṃ yaśaśca ||92 ||
SA07n944:186: dravyaṃ yathā syat kaṭukaṃ rasena taccopayuktaṃ madhuraṃ vipāke |
SA07n944:187: tathaiva vīryaṃ kaṭukaṃ śrameṇa tasyārtha siddhyai madhuro vipākaḥ ||93 ||
SA07n944:188: vīryaṃ paraṃ kāryakṛtau hi mūlaṃ vīryādṛte kācana nāsti siddhiḥ |
SA07n944:189: udeti vīryādiha sarvasaṃpannirvīryatā cet sakalaśca pāpmā ||94 ||
SA07n944:194: nayaṃ śrutvā śakto yadayamabhivṛddhiṃ na labhate
SA07n944:195: paraṃ dharmaṃ jñātvā yadupari nivāsaṃ na labhate |
SA07n944:196: gṛhaṃ tyaktvā muktau yadayamupaśāntiṃ na labhate |
SA07n944:197: nimittaṃ kausīdyaṃ bhavati puruṣasyātra na ripuḥ ||96 ||
SA07n944:198: anikṣiptotsāho yadi khanati gāṃ vāri labhate |
SA07n944:201: drutaṃ nityaṃ yāntyo girimapi hi bhindanti saritaḥ ||97 ||
SA07n944:202: kṛṣṭvā gāṃ paripālya ca śramaśatairaśnoti sasyaśriyaṃ
SA07n944:205: tadvīryaṃ kuru śāntaye viniyataṃ vīrye hi sarvarddhayaḥ ||98 ||
SA07n944:206: saundarananda mahākāvye “āryasatya“ nāma ṣoḍaśa sarga samāpta |
